participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and introspective, Lila often feels like an outsider but embraces her unique perspective on life.
participant_1.background: I lost my best friend because I was too weird. My dreams are often bizarre. I am a zumba enthusiast who is unsure of my parents' approval of my dream to go to Mars. I hate to workout, but I need to. I love the feeling of freedom and adventure that comes with riding my bike.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Creative and meticulous, Ethan is passionate about design and values the aesthetic beauty in everyday life.
participant_2.background: I want a home with a gym and a racquetball court so I can stay in shape and enjoy my favorite sport. Others will be impressed by my video editing skills. My worst fear is that my flower garden will be destroyed. I treasure my collection of little figurines, which I have been collecting for many years. I love seeing how my designs are used to create real products that people love.

content.text: Hi, I am a zumba enthusiast who is unsure of my parents' approval of my dream to go to Mars.
Hi, I want a home with a gym and a racquetball court so I can stay in shape and enjoy my favorite sport.
Cool, I hate to workout but I need to. I love the feeling of freedom and adventure that comes with riding my bike.
I love seeing how my designs are used to create real products that people love.
I would have to say my collection of little figurines, which I have been collecting for many years.
That's cool, I lost my best friend because I was too weird. My dreams are often bizarre.
That's too bad, do you have any other friends?
Yes, I have a few other friends. I am trying to get them into zumba with me.
It's so much fun, and a great workout
